front.title: Log More Routing Events in the BGP Monitoring Protocol (BMP)

abstract.t: The Route Event Logging (REL) message is defined in [I-D.ietf-grow-bmp-rel] and is used to report event-driven data to the BMP Server from the monitored routers. This document defines more event-driven data for BGP FlowSpec RFC8955 [RFC8956] and BGP SR Policies [I-D.ietf-idr-sr-policy-safi].
